--------------------------------------------


Examples of [cola](https://github.com/jokergoo/cola) analysis ([package version 1.3.2](https://github.com/jokergoo/cola/releases/tag/1.3.2)):

### RNASeq datasets

- [on Golub leukemia dataset](https://jokergoo.github.io/cola_examples/Golub_leukemia/), 7129 features, 72 samples
- [on HSMM single cell dataset](https://jokergoo.github.io/cola_examples/HSMM_single_cell/), 47192 features, 271 samples
- [on MCF10CA single cell dataset](https://jokergoo.github.io/cola_examples/MCF10CA_scRNAseq/), 5870 features, 160 samples
- [on Ritz ALL dataset](https://jokergoo.github.io/cola_examples/Ritz_ALL/), 12625 features, 128 samples
- [on TCGA GBM dataset](https://jokergoo.github.io/cola_examples/TCGA_GBM/), 11861 features, 173 samples

### Methylation array dataset

- [on GBM 450K array dataset](https://jokergoo.github.io/cola_examples/GBM_450K/), 387901 features, 136 samples

### Other datasets

There are also collections of cola analysis on public datasets:

- [on 206 GDS datasets](https://cola-gds.github.io/)
- [on 223 recount2 datasets](https://cola-recount2.github.io/)
